plugin.name: SeekDB
plugin.author: Zargulis
plugin.description:
SeekDB (+ SeekRep) ------- Seek clanskill ouput reporter and database.
>> seekdb help for general use
>> seekrep config help for seekrep initial setup configuration

muclient.aliases:
<alias match="^seekrep\s(?((\d*\.)?\w+))\s?(?(top|bot|all|immcheck|verbose))?\s?(?\d+)?" script="startSeek" regexp="y" enabled="y" group="seekrep" send_to="12" sequence="100" > <alias match="^seekdb\s?(?(\S+))?\s?(?(\S+))?" script="read_seekdb" regexp="y" enabled="y" sequence="100">
<alias match="^seekrep config(\s((?(channel|rvcolor|rncolor|sepcolor|output)) (?.+)))?$" enabled="y" regexp="y" script="config_handler" sequence="99"> <alias match="^seekrep config(\s((?(output)) (?(echo|channel|both))))?$" enabled="y" regexp="y" script="config_handler" sequence="99"> <alias match="^seekrep config (?reset|help)$" enabled="y" regexp="y" script="config_handler" sequence="99">
<alias match="^seekdb delete\s(?(\d+))$" enabled="y" regexp="y" script="delete_check" sequence="99"> <alias match="^seekdb delete\s(?(\d+))\sconfirm" enabled="y" regexp="y" script="delete_confirm" sequence="99">
